topic.title: Core Digital Banking solution
topic.shortdesc: The Core Digital Banking solution provides the basic digital banking services, including integration with existing bank systems, storing and providing data, secure customer operations, executing transactions, and support for additional banking functionalities. The product includes the Authentication and Authorization solution along with other key components: Instant Data (GDS), Payments and Instructions (TPM), Integration Hub (IHUB), Service Proxy (SPX), Admin Console (WAC), Login and Workspace GUI applications for bank clients and bank employees.
